mapper.insert: INSERT INTO USER ( USER_IDX , EMAIL , NICKNAME , PSWORD , GENDER , BORNYEAR , DELETE_YN , INSERT_DATE , INSERT_ID ) VALUES ( (SELECT IFNULL(MAX(USER_IDX), 0)+1 FROM USER A) , '${email}' , '${nickname}' , '${psword}' , '${gender}' , '${bornYear}' , 'N' , NOW() , '${insertId}' )
